explains: vt. 伪造；篡改；歪曲；证明……虚假

sentences.en: Sincerity, expressed by human lips and enforced by eyes, is impossible to falsify.
sentences.cn: 由人的嘴唇表达，再由人的眼睛强化的这份真诚，是不可能说谎的。

sentences.en: Of course the whole science symbol is testing hypothesis and hoping someone would say to falsify them.
sentences.cn: 当然，整个科学符号都是测试假设，和希望有人能证明其为假。

sentences.en: One may doubt whether our memory, which omits so much from the dream, does not falsify what it retains.
sentences.cn: 他们质疑我们的记忆是否把梦中的许多内容删除了，存在脑海中的是否只是假象，而并非梦境。
